entries.journal_entry_description: Disable the power locks in the bunker to access their control room.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Warden Tosk will most likely have the pass key you need to access their power room in order to release the locks and gain access to their control systems.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Now that you have the Pass Key, access the power room and disable their locking systems.
